title: Halfway Between Worlds: Bloodline of the Pure
description: This edition of the book is longer available for purchase. You may check the latest edition here. Seventeen-year-old Alice Teller is called and crosses into the higher, natural world of magic - one of the higher incarnation points for the more evolved, intuitively developed souls leading away from the material universe and towards the realm of spirit. Alice begins her education, training and development in the shamanistic higher, natural world of magic and is soon woken up to the deadly nature of her new world.
author: S.B. Terra
